name: SPDR Dow Jones International Real Estate ETF
description: The SPDR Dow Jones International Real Estate ETF (RWX) is an exchange-traded fund that aims to provide investors with exposure to real estate investment trusts (REITs) and real estate operating companies outside of the United States. Launched in 2003, RWX seeks to track the performance of the Dow Jones Global ex-U.S. Real Estate Index, which includes companies primarily engaged in the ownership, operation, and development of real estate properties in various international markets. The fund provides investors with a diversified portfolio of real estate assets, capturing opportunities in different geographic regions, including Europe, Asia, and the Pacific. By investing in RWX, investors can gain access to a variety of property types, such as residential, commercial, and industrial real estate, while also benefiting from potential income through dividends and capital appreciation. The ETF is designed for those looking to diversify their investment portfolios with real estate exposure beyond domestic markets, making it a strategic choice for international diversification. RWX is managed by State Street Global Advisors, one of the largest asset managers in the world, ensuring a high level of expertise in managing real estate investments.

products: SPDR Dow Jones International Real Estate ETF (RWX)
